game.name: Train Simulator: Salzburg - Rosenheim Route Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: All aboard for Austria! Take charge of cross-border passenger & freight traffic with RSSLO’s Salzburg - Rosenheim route for Train Simulator.
